sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css' import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' import {useParams} from "react-router-dom" import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() //this is an static data later we will call our API and load our data from database const tour = tourData.find(tour => tour.id === id) //destructure properties from tour project const {photo, title, desc, city, distance, price, reviews, maxGroupSize} = tour return <>

{title}

(4.0)

{desc}
} export default TourDetails
